code: var parse=require("./parse");var walk=require("./walk");var stringify=require("./stringify");function ValueParser(value){if(this instanceof ValueParser){this.nodes=parse(value);return this;}return new ValueParser(value);}ValueParser.prototype.toString=function(){return Array.isArray(this.nodes)?stringify(this.nodes):"";};ValueParser.prototype.walk=function(cb,bubble){walk(this.nodes,cb,bubble);return this;};ValueParser.unit=require("./unit");ValueParser.walk=walk;ValueParser.stringify=stringify;module.exports=ValueParser;
